title: Gujarat Titans vs Mumbai Indians Highlights, IPL 2025 Eliminator: Rohit Sharma, Jasprit Bumrah Ooze Class As MI Beat GT In Thrilling Eliminator
description: Gujarat Titans vs Mumbai Indians Highlights, IPL 2025: GT need 30 runs in 7 balls to win it against MI in the Eliminator.
excerpt: Gujarat Titans vs Mumbai Indians Highlights, IPL 2025: GT need 30 runs in 7 balls to win it against MI in the Eliminator.
text: GT vs MI LIVE: Thank you! That's a wrap for today's IPL 2025 coverage. Mumbai Indians stay alive, Gujarat Titans bid goodbye. We will be back with the penultimate game of the tournament on Sunday, but stay tuned to NDTV Sports for the live and latest updates of sports events around the world.Join us tomorrow as India A continue their unofficial Test against England Lions, while PSG take on Inter in the Champions League final! There's some French Open and F1 action too.Thank you! Goodnight. GT vs MI LIVE: MI to play PBKS Punjab Kings lost Qualifier 1, Mumbai Indians won Eliminator. They'll clash for a spot in the final, where Royal Challengers Bengaluru have booked one spot. The match will take place at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, on Sunday! GT vs MI, Eliminator: MI WIN ELIMINATOR MUMBAI INDIANS WIN! They've done, they clinch a 20 run-win in the end. The five-time champions will face Punjab Kings in Qualifier 2. End of the road for Gujarat Titans, who finish the season with three straight losses.MI 228/5 (20) beat GT 208/6 (20) by 20 runs! GT vs MI LIVE: Bowler change! Bowler change and OUT! Richard Gleeson is struggling and has asked to go off, Ashwani is bowling the final 3 deliveries. And he gets the wicket of Shahrukh Khan straight away. That's surely the end of the contest then.GT 208/6 (19.4) GT vs MI LIVE: Surely MI have won it! Single, dot ball and 2 runs. Makes the equation 21 needed off the final 3 balls. Three legal deliveries and Mumbai Indians are making their way to the IPL 2025 Qualifier 2!GT 208/5 (19.3) GT vs MI LIVE: 24 to win off the last! Shahrukh Khan smashes a six, and Gujarat Titans have kept their slender hopes alive heading into the final over. Shahrukh clears square-leg, deposits the final delivery into the stands with a superb hit. 24 needed in the final over!GT 205/5 (19) GT vs MI LIVE: Big wicket! Boult gets Rutherford! The West Indian falls right into the trap. Goes for the big shot, but doesn't connect well enough, and is caught by Tilak Varma at deep mid-wicket. Trent Boult strikes with the first ball of his last over.GT 193/5 (18.1) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! WOW! What a hit! Bumrah aims for a yorker well on the leg side, Tewatia anticipates it, moves towards the leg-side and clears it over mid-wicket. Middle of the bat, incredible shot by Tewatia. 9 runs off the over. GT need 18 an over for the last two!GT 193/4 (18) GT vs MI LIVE, Eliminator: FOUR! Crucial boundary! Tewatia comes dancing down the track and targets the gap through the covers. Smacks it for 4, past any fielder. But it is still a good over by Ashwani on the whole. Only 9 off it. 45 runs needed in 18 balls.GT 184/4 (17) GT vs MI Eliminator LIVE: GT need 54 off 24! 54 runs needed in the final 4 overs. Anyone's game from here. Sherfane Rutherford is finding the gaps, getting the boundaries. Rahul Tewatia is a proven finisher. Shahrukh Khan and Rashid Khan will come after this and even he can hit a long way.GT 175/4 (16) GT vs MI LIVE: OUT! Sudharsan is gone! Out for 80! Big, big wicket in the context of the match. The Orange Cap holder is clean bowled by MI debutant Richard Gleeson. Sudharsan goes for the scoop shot, misses, and Gleeson strikes the middle stump.Â GT 170/4 (15.4) GT vs MI LIVE: Two boundaries in a row Back-to-back boundaries for Sherfane Rutherford. The West Indian has started off his innings really well. First, guides it through third man for 4. Next ball, flicked into the gap on the side. Excellent strokeplay.GT 170/3 (15.3) GT vs MI LIVE: Pressure on GT Gujarat Titans need 68 runs in 30 balls! Required run-rate is over 13. This will be a terrific chase if they pull this off, but the loss of the aggressor Washington has hurt their scoring rate a little bit. Up to Sudharsan and Rutherford now.GT 161/3 (15) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: BUMRAH, WOW! STUNNING YORKER! Bumrah gets Washington Sundar! What a delivery, cleans up Washington through the legs. The batter is on the left stumbling to the floor. End of a great knock by Washington, and it needed a cracker from Bumrah to do it.4 runs only from Bumrah's over.GT 152/3 (14) GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR! Washington Sundar! 6, 6, wd, 4! Trent Boult has been shelled out the treatment, MI look shell-shocked! None of Hardik Pandya's tactics are working at the moment. Sundar has raced to 47 off just 22 balls.GT 148/2 (13) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! SIX! What a shot! Washington Sundar receives a slower short ball by Boult, who is back into the attack, and Washington helps it over square-leg for a maximum. Next ball, even bigger. SIX more! Smashed. Bludgeoned. Over mid-wicket.GT 143/2 (12.5) GT vs MI LIVE: Runs keep coming! GT are keeping this very much alive! Required run-rate is nearly 13, but Sai Sudharsan and Washington Sundar are making a good run chase out of this one. 8 overs to go, 99 runs needed.GT 130/2 (12) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! SIX! Washington Sundar ends the 11th over with a bang. Cracking shot, over long-on. Fielder in the deep thought he was interested for a second, but the hit was sweeter. Washington playing a really good hand here after being sent in at No. 4. Hardik goes for runs again.GT 119/2 (11) GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR! Slammed back past the bowler! Ashwani Kumar is on as the Impact Player, with Rohit Sharma being substituted. Washington hits it back past Hardik the bowler, straight down the ground for 4. Hardik's comeback is excellent, nails a yorker and gets a dot ball.GT 113/2 (10.4) GT vs MI LIVE: 106 after first 10 106 runs after 10 overs, meaning GT need 123 in the final 10. Still a long, long way to go. However, given the fact that they lost Gill in the very first over, GT have done well to stay alive in the run chase.GT 106/2 (10) IPL 2025 LIVE: Gujarat Titans reach 100! Gujarat Titans get to 100 in just 9.2 overs. And Washington Sundar hits a boundary on the very next ball! Gleeson has conceded a lot of runs today. Sudharsan is up to 66, while Sundar has now hit a six and a four.GT 104/2 (9.3) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Sai Sudharsan slams 50 50 for Sai Sudharsan! What a knock by the left-hander. A big night was needed from him, and so far he has stepped up. The two wickets haven't slowed the run-rate by a huge amount, with Sudharsan continuing the boundaries.GT 85/2 (8) GT vs MI LIVE: HIT WICKET! Kusal Mendis GONE! Hit wicket! Dramatic scenes here in Mullanpur. Goes deep into his crease to play Mitchell Santner, but loses his balance and falls onto his stumps! MI break the partnership in the strangest of manners.GT 67/2 (6.2) GT vs MI LIVE: 66 in the powerplay Losing Shubman Gill in the first over was a huge blow, but GT have made a superb recovery right after that. Sai Sudharsan is into the 40s, having crossed 700 runs in IPL 2025. Kusal Mendis has made a fast start at the other end too!GT 66/1 (6) GT vs MI LIVE: Sai Sudharsan's big feat 4! Sai Sudharsan with a cracking shot against Bumrah! Slammed through mid-wicket, exquisite timing with power. A big feat for him meanwhile -- he has become only the second batter to score 700+ in an IPL season before the age of 24 (Gill was the other).GT 59/1 (5.1) GT vs MI LIVE: GT romping Sai Sudharsan and Kusal Mendis are both playing really well! 50 partnership up between the two and they're going at 11 runs an over in the powerplay. Boundaries coming thick and fast. A bit of a desperate move from Hardik as he bowls in the powerplay, but it backfires as 14 come off the over.GT 55/1 (5) GT vs MI LIVE: Sudharsan crosses 700 runs! BANG! Thrashed through the off-side by Sai Sudharsan! Gujarat Titans staying alive in this chase despite the early loss of their captain. Sudharsan crosses 700 runs in IPL 2025, what a year this has been for him.GT 41/1 (4) GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR! Sai Sudharsan slams a boundary! Short ball by Gleeson and sharply pulled towards fine-leg by Sai Sudharsan. The left-hander needs to play a big innings today, as he nears the 700-run mark in IPL 2025.GT 35/1 (3.3) GT vs MI LIVE: 3 sixes in one over! Maximums! First 6 of the Gujarat Titans innings. Three balls later, Kusal Mendis slams a maximum, cracking shot over deep mid-wicket. Having dropped Rohit earlier, he has a big responsibility on his shoulders with the bat today.Make that THREE! Kusal again, over square-leg. Handsome shot.GT 30/1 (3) GT vs MI LIVE: Bumrah opens the bowling Jasprit Bumrah taking the new ball from the other end. With no Deepak Chahar today, responsibility with the new ball returns to the shoulders of Bumrah. And he shows his quality. Does not offer an inch to the others.GT 9/1 (2) GT vs MI LIVE: OUT! SHUBMAN GILL GONE! Humongous wicket for Mumbai Indians in the very first over. This is the worst-possible start for Gujarat Titans, they've lost their captain. Fast inswinger by Trent Boult, Gill misses it, traps on the pad and the finger goes up straight away.Gill takes the DRS review, but he's out.GT 5/1 (1) GT vs MI LIVE: The chase begins... Shubman Gill and B Sai Sudharsan are out to open, Trent Boult is taking the new ball. A daunting target is in front of Gujarat Titans. A cracking cover drive by Sai Sudharsan early on, but stopped well in the field.GT 3/0 (0.3) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: GT need 229 A massive target for Gujarat Titans. With no Jos Buttler, they will need Shubman Gill and B Sai Sudharsan to give them a terrific start, as well as hope that their slightly more fragile middle order can come good today. Onus on Kusal Mendis to make up for his fielding mistakes. GT vs MI LIVE: MI end on 228 228! Daunting total set by Mumbai Indians in the Eliminator. It is the highest score made in the Mullanpur ground. Rohit Sharma leading the way with a sensational 81, and he's made sure that his Test captaincy successor Shubman Gill will not have an easy night to come.MI 228/5 (20 overs)GT Target: 229 GT vs MI LIVE: Third six of the over Massive! Once again, Hardik Pandya shows his might. What a finish the MI captain is providing here. Coetzee has conceded 21 in this over, and we still have a ball left. Hammered over long-off, and another wide by Coetzee.MI 227/5 (19.5) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX MORE! Hardik Pandya, that is sweet! Short ball by Coetzee and sent way into the stands by the Mumbai Indians captain. Two balls to go still, and Coetzee bowls a wide! MI one run away from the coveted 220.MI 219/5 (19.4) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! Hardik Pandya! MONSTER HIT! Hardik Pandya sends it high, and handsome! Second ball of the over, Pandya is deep into his crease and sends it 95m into the stands. Mumbai Indians past 210. Misses out on the third ball.MI 212/5 (19.3) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! OUT! Naman Dhir, maximum! Mumbai Indians cross 200, and we still have 9 balls to go. Next ball, Naman goes for a big shot again through deep mid-wicket, but Rashid Khan has completed a superb diving catch!MI 206/5 (18.4) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Injury concern for GT Mohammed Siraj is down, and is being attended to by the physios. Two balls after taking a wicket, he seems to have picked up an injury. He is fit enough to continue, and he does get through the whole over. Still hobbling a fair bit, but a good comeback after conceding a six on the first ball.MI 198/4 (18) GT vs MI LIVE: OUT! Six, but then out! Tilak Varma hammers Mohammed Siraj for a maximum on the first ball of the 17th over, but misses his timing on the pace-off delivery and departs. Handy 25 off just 11 balls by Tilak. MI are 6 short of 200.MI 194/4 (17.2) GT vs MI LIVE: OUT! GONE! At last, at long last, Gujarat Titans have Rohit Sharma's wicket. Huge scalp for GT. Massive wicket. Goes for the slog over mid-wicket, but doesn't connect well, and a good catch taken by Rashid Khan in the deep. Rohit out for 81 off 50!MI 188/3 (17) GT vs MI LIVE: Tilak smashing it! Prasidh Krishna back into the attack, and taken to the cleaners straight away by Tilak! Shuffles across the stumps and whacks it over square-leg for a maximum! Prasidh gave away 26 in his previous over, and this one hasn't started well.MI 181/2 (16.1) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Tilak into the party! Here comes Tilak Varma, going for the attack! Slams it over long-off for a maximum. Mumbai Indians maintaining a fabulous run-rate today. They've dominated this match so far, ridden their luck, and made it count.MI 175/2 (16) GT vs MI LIVE: Rohit into the 80s SIX more! Whipped away over square-leg, all the way for 6. Next ball, change of pace by Coetzee, goes for a cutter, soft edge from Rohit but it falls just short of Kusal Mendis. How many more chances will GT miss to dismiss Rohit?MI 168/2 (15.4) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! Maximum for Rohit Sharma! Up to 74! Rohit Sharma is just 26 runs away from this third IPL century, and first in the playoffs. Mumbai Indians are going at well over 10 runs an over, and should be aiming for at least 220 from here.MI 160/2 (15) GT vs MI LIVE: 150 up for Mumbai Indians! Seven runs came off the over fromÂ Washington Sundar. Rohit Sharma played a cut shot on the fourth ball of the over through the backward point for a four. He is now batting at the score of 66 off 41 balls. 150 is up for Mumbai Indians.MI 150/2 (14) GT vs MI LIVE: OUT! Big wicket this is! Suryakumar Yadav is OUT! It was a lower full toss from Sai Kishore outside off stump and Suryakumar played a sweep shot on it. He played it to perfection but found the man in the deep at backward square leg. Surya is gone for 33 off 20 balls.MI 143/2 (13) GT vs MI LIVE: Catch dropped! It was an eventful over fromÂ Gerald Coetzee. He was hit for two consecutive sixes by Suryakumar Yadav but bounced back well and managed to produce an outside edge of the batter. GT wicketkeeperÂ Kusal Mendis jumped to his right and dropped the chance. A total of 14 runs came off the over.MI 134/1 (12) GT vs MI LIVE: Good bowling! Rashid Khan continues to bowl tight overs. Seven runs came from this third. He even produced an inside edge from Suryakumar Yadav's bat on the fourth ball of the over when the batter tried to play a sweep shot, but to his poor luck the ball missed the stumps and the wicketkeeper to race away for a four.Â MI 120/1 (11) GT vs MI LIVE: 50 FOR ROHIT! 50 for Rohit Sharma! Big day, big player. Dropped twice at the start, and he's taken full advantage of the lifelines handed to him. Gets to the milestone in just 28 balls. However, a warning from Sunil Gavaskar, as he hits another difficult aerial shot. "Living dangerously," says Gavaskar.MI 113/1 (10) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX, 100 up! Rohit Sharma goes big! 100 up for Mumbai Indians! Rohit is up to 46, MI reach 100 in under 9 overs. He has been dropped twice today, and he has made sure that Gujarat Titans pay the price for it.Â MI 101/9 (9) GT vs MI LIVE: OUT! Bairstow departs! What a catch! Bairstow goes for the reverse sweep against Sai Kishore, but Sai Sudharsan at point fails to hold on. But he does enough to throw it back to Gerald Coetzee who grabs it! Bairstow out for 47.MI 84/1 (7.2) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: 79 in powerplay! Rohit Sharma ends the powerplay with another 4! What a powerplay for Mumbai Indians. Gujarat Titans bowlers have been sent to the cleaners. Whether it's Siraj, Prasidh or Sai Kishore, MI openers have shown no mercy. Bairstow 44 off 17. Rohit 33 off 19.MI 79/0 (6) GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! Rohit into the party! Best powerplay of the season for MI, and we still have 3 balls to go. Swept over deep square-leg for a maximum, as R Sai Kishore comes into bowl his first over. Next ball, swept again, one bounce 4!MI 75/0 (5.4) GT vs MI LIVE: Bairstow going berserk! 6, 4, 6, 6, 4 - What an over for Mumbai Indians! Jonny Bairstow has hammered Prasidh Krishna for 26 runs in one over! Brutal hitting. Ryan Rickelton not there? No problem, says Jonny Bairstow. Off-side, on-side, down the ground, edge, everything going MI's way.Shubman Gill does not look happy at all.MI 54/0 (4) IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: SIX! FOUR! Bairstow, MAXIMUM! What a hit from the Englishman, welcome back to the IPL! Length ball and Bairstow clears it over deep square-leg. Next ball, smashed through point for another boundary. Bairstow in the mood.MI 38/0 (3.2) GT vs MI LIVE: Rohit dropped again! Another drop! Rohit Sharma has been dropped not once, but TWICE! Thick outside edge against Siraj, but wicket-keeper Kusal Mendis has completely fumbled it. Not easy filling the boots of Jos Buttler, but this could be a costly problem.Â MI 26/0 (2.4) GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR! FOUR! Rohit! Rohit Sharma slams it down the ground! Classy shot from the former MI captain, straight back past the bowler. Next ball, he connects even better, one bounce and into the fence. Rohit was dropped on 3, will he make GT pay?MI 26/0 (2.2) GT vs MI LIVE: DROPPED! Big mistake! Rohit Sharma has been dropped by Gerald Coetzee! The veteran mistimed the shot completely, Coetzee was well-placed at long-on, but the ball just pops out of his hand. Massive fielding error by GT.MI 18/0 (2) GT vs MI LIVE: New ball for Prasidh Interesting decision by Shubman Gill! Prasidh Krishna is usually the middle overs enforcer and bowls at the death. But in the absence of Arshad Khan or Ishant Sharma, Prasidh is taking the new ball today for GT.MI 15/0 (1.4) GT vs MI LIVE: Good first over Good first over by Mohammed Siraj. Just 6 runs come off it. Rohit Sharma and Jonny Bairstow with a couple of nice strokes through the off-side but denied by good fielding in the covers by GT. MI need to get a good powerplay, with Hardik taking the brave call of batting first.MI 6/0 (1) GT vs MI LIVE: Here come the players! The players are out in the middle. Led by Shubman Gill, they walk past the fireworks go off. Jonny Bairstow is out to open for MI, coming in as the direct replacement of Ryan Rickelton. Rohit Sharma is opening at the other end. IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: 10 minutes to start! We are just 10 minutes away from the start of Eliminator 1. A bunch of debutants on both sides, adding more international flavour to this contest. Gujarat Titans to bowl, because Mumbai Indians won the toss and opted to bat!Â  GT vs MI LIVE: Can Rohit Sharma perform? All eyes on Rohit Sharma. The veteran has had a stop-start season, but there is no better stage to bring out his A-game than tonight. Rohit has shown glimpses of his class this season, but can he save his best for the business end of the tournament? GT vs MI LIVE: GT Playing XI Gujarat Titans XI vs MI:Â Sai Sudharsan, Shubman Gill, Kusal Mendis (wk), Washington Sundar, Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, R Sai Kishore, Gerald Coetzee, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna.Mendis replaces Buttler, who has gone for international duty. No Arshad Khan either as Washington comes in. GT vs MI LIVE: MI Playing XI Mumbai Indians playing XI vs GT:Â Rohit Sharma, Jonny Bairstow (wk), Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya (c), Naman Dhir, Raj Bawa, Mitchell Santner, Trent Boult, Jasprit Bumrah, Richard Gleeson.3 debutants for MI -- Bairstow, Gleeson and Raj Bawa. Ashwani Kumar will likely be the Impact Player. IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Surprise debutant for MI! Mumbai Indians have been forced to make two changes to their lineup, with Will Jacks and Ryan Rickelton going away for international duty. Jonny Bairstow and Richard Gleeson enter. However, an interesting call - debut handed to Indian uncapped all-rounder Raj Bawa. GT vs MI LIVE: MI WIN TOSS IN ELIMINATOR Mumbai Indians have won the toss and opted to bat! Hardik Pandya calls it correctly, and has, perhaps a tad surprisingly, chosen to bat first in the Eliminator! Interesting call from the Mumbai Indians captain. GT to bowl, then. GT vs MI LIVE: "MI will win," says AB GT vs MI LIVE: Suryakumar eyeing huge record Suryakumar Yadav is eyeing a massive record set by AB de Villiers. Having been MI's most consistent batter this year, SKY has already smashed 640 runs in IPL 2025. However, if he scores 48 more runs, he can cross de Villiers to become the middle-order batter with the most runs in a single season in IPL history. IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: GT vs MI H2H What is the head-to-head record between Gujarat Titans and Mumbai Indians? GT hold an big 5-2 advantage over MI in their 7 meetings till date. The two teams have met twice this season already, with GT winning both home and away.Can MI reverse that fate today? GT vs MI LIVE, Eliminator: Toss in 20 minutes! We are just 20 minutes away from toss time in Mullanpur, where the Eliminator is being held. GT are set to be led by India's new Test captain Shubman Gill. On the other hand, MI will be captained by Hardik Pandya, who will lead against his former franchise. IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: GT eyeing second title Gujarat Titans are a franchise that's only 4 years old. But already, they have two IPL finals and one IPL title to their name. Can they go the distance once again? Just like MI, they also need to win three matches in a row to make it happen. GT vs MI LIVE: MI eyeing title no. 6 Mumbai Indians are eyeing a record sixth title. For captain Rohit Sharma, he's eyeing his 7th IPL trophy, something that no IPL player in history has done. But for that to happen, they will need to win 3 games in a row. Defeat today, and that dream will end in 2025. GT vs MI LIVE: Qualifier 2 the target The winner of today's match will qualify for Qualifier 2, where they will play Punjab Kings for a place in the final. The loser today will be eliminated from the tournament. Just to recap, Royal Challengers Bengaluru are already in the final, after they beat PBKS in Qualifier 1 yesterday! GT vs MI LIVE: Hello and welcome! A very good evening to one and all, welcome to NDTV Sports! IPL 2025 playoffs is in full swing, and today is the crucial Eliminator. Mumbai Indians take on Gujarat Titans, and it is a must-win match to keep the title hopes alive.
html:
GT vs MI LIVE: Thank you!

That's a wrap for today's IPL 2025 coverage. Mumbai Indians stay alive, Gujarat Titans bid goodbye. We will be back with the penultimate game of the tournament on Sunday, but stay tuned to NDTV Sports for the live and latest updates of sports events around the world.

Join us tomorrow as India A continue their unofficial Test against England Lions, while PSG take on Inter in the Champions League final! There's some French Open and F1 action too.

Thank you! Goodnight.

GT vs MI LIVE: MI to play PBKS

Punjab Kings lost Qualifier 1, Mumbai Indians won Eliminator. They'll clash for a spot in the final, where Royal Challengers Bengaluru have booked one spot. The match will take place at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, on Sunday!

GT vs MI, Eliminator: MI WIN ELIMINATOR

MUMBAI INDIANS WIN! They've done, they clinch a 20 run-win in the end. The five-time champions will face Punjab Kings in Qualifier 2. End of the road for Gujarat Titans, who finish the season with three straight losses.

MI 228/5 (20) beat GT 208/6 (20) by 20 runs!

GT vs MI LIVE: Bowler change!

Bowler change and OUT! Richard Gleeson is struggling and has asked to go off, Ashwani is bowling the final 3 deliveries. And he gets the wicket of Shahrukh Khan straight away. That's surely the end of the contest then.

GT 208/6 (19.4)

GT vs MI LIVE: Surely MI have won it!

Single, dot ball and 2 runs. Makes the equation 21 needed off the final 3 balls. Three legal deliveries and Mumbai Indians are making their way to the IPL 2025 Qualifier 2!

GT 208/5 (19.3)

GT vs MI LIVE: 24 to win off the last!

Shahrukh Khan smashes a six, and Gujarat Titans have kept their slender hopes alive heading into the final over. Shahrukh clears square-leg, deposits the final delivery into the stands with a superb hit. 24 needed in the final over!

GT 205/5 (19)

GT vs MI LIVE: Big wicket!

Boult gets Rutherford! The West Indian falls right into the trap. Goes for the big shot, but doesn't connect well enough, and is caught by Tilak Varma at deep mid-wicket. Trent Boult strikes with the first ball of his last over.

GT 193/5 (18.1)

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX!

WOW! What a hit! Bumrah aims for a yorker well on the leg side, Tewatia anticipates it, moves towards the leg-side and clears it over mid-wicket. Middle of the bat, incredible shot by Tewatia. 9 runs off the over. GT need 18 an over for the last two!

GT 193/4 (18)

GT vs MI LIVE, Eliminator: FOUR!

Crucial boundary! Tewatia comes dancing down the track and targets the gap through the covers. Smacks it for 4, past any fielder. But it is still a good over by Ashwani on the whole. Only 9 off it. 45 runs needed in 18 balls.

GT 184/4 (17)

GT vs MI Eliminator LIVE: GT need 54 off 24!

54 runs needed in the final 4 overs. Anyone's game from here. Sherfane Rutherford is finding the gaps, getting the boundaries. Rahul Tewatia is a proven finisher. Shahrukh Khan and Rashid Khan will come after this and even he can hit a long way.

GT 175/4 (16)

GT vs MI LIVE: OUT!

Sudharsan is gone! Out for 80! Big, big wicket in the context of the match. The Orange Cap holder is clean bowled by MI debutant Richard Gleeson. Sudharsan goes for the scoop shot, misses, and Gleeson strikes the middle stump.Â 

GT 170/4 (15.4)

GT vs MI LIVE: Two boundaries in a row

Back-to-back boundaries for Sherfane Rutherford. The West Indian has started off his innings really well. First, guides it through third man for 4. Next ball, flicked into the gap on the side. Excellent strokeplay.

GT 170/3 (15.3)

GT vs MI LIVE: Pressure on GT

Gujarat Titans need 68 runs in 30 balls! Required run-rate is over 13. This will be a terrific chase if they pull this off, but the loss of the aggressor Washington has hurt their scoring rate a little bit. Up to Sudharsan and Rutherford now.

GT 161/3 (15)

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: BUMRAH, WOW!

STUNNING YORKER! Bumrah gets Washington Sundar! What a delivery, cleans up Washington through the legs. The batter is on the left stumbling to the floor. End of a great knock by Washington, and it needed a cracker from Bumrah to do it.

4 runs only from Bumrah's over.

GT 152/3 (14)

GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR!

Washington Sundar! 6, 6, wd, 4! Trent Boult has been shelled out the treatment, MI look shell-shocked! None of Hardik Pandya's tactics are working at the moment. Sundar has raced to 47 off just 22 balls.

GT 148/2 (13)

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! SIX!

What a shot! Washington Sundar receives a slower short ball by Boult, who is back into the attack, and Washington helps it over square-leg for a maximum. Next ball, even bigger. SIX more! Smashed. Bludgeoned. Over mid-wicket.

GT 143/2 (12.5)

GT vs MI LIVE: Runs keep coming!

GT are keeping this very much alive! Required run-rate is nearly 13, but Sai Sudharsan and Washington Sundar are making a good run chase out of this one. 8 overs to go, 99 runs needed.

GT 130/2 (12)

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX!

SIX! Washington Sundar ends the 11th over with a bang. Cracking shot, over long-on. Fielder in the deep thought he was interested for a second, but the hit was sweeter. Washington playing a really good hand here after being sent in at No. 4. Hardik goes for runs again.

GT 119/2 (11)

GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR!

Slammed back past the bowler! Ashwani Kumar is on as the Impact Player, with Rohit Sharma being substituted. Washington hits it back past Hardik the bowler, straight down the ground for 4. Hardik's comeback is excellent, nails a yorker and gets a dot ball.

GT 113/2 (10.4)

GT vs MI LIVE: 106 after first 10

106 runs after 10 overs, meaning GT need 123 in the final 10. Still a long, long way to go. However, given the fact that they lost Gill in the very first over, GT have done well to stay alive in the run chase.

GT 106/2 (10)

IPL 2025 LIVE: Gujarat Titans reach 100!

Gujarat Titans get to 100 in just 9.2 overs. And Washington Sundar hits a boundary on the very next ball! Gleeson has conceded a lot of runs today. Sudharsan is up to 66, while Sundar has now hit a six and a four.

GT 104/2 (9.3)

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Sai Sudharsan slams 50

50 for Sai Sudharsan! What a knock by the left-hander. A big night was needed from him, and so far he has stepped up. The two wickets haven't slowed the run-rate by a huge amount, with Sudharsan continuing the boundaries.

GT 85/2 (8)

GT vs MI LIVE: HIT WICKET!

Kusal Mendis GONE! Hit wicket! Dramatic scenes here in Mullanpur. Goes deep into his crease to play Mitchell Santner, but loses his balance and falls onto his stumps! MI break the partnership in the strangest of manners.

GT 67/2 (6.2)

GT vs MI LIVE: 66 in the powerplay

Losing Shubman Gill in the first over was a huge blow, but GT have made a superb recovery right after that. Sai Sudharsan is into the 40s, having crossed 700 runs in IPL 2025. Kusal Mendis has made a fast start at the other end too!

GT 66/1 (6)

GT vs MI LIVE: Sai Sudharsan's big feat

4! Sai Sudharsan with a cracking shot against Bumrah! Slammed through mid-wicket, exquisite timing with power. A big feat for him meanwhile -- he has become only the second batter to score 700+ in an IPL season before the age of 24 (Gill was the other).

GT 59/1 (5.1)

GT vs MI LIVE: GT romping

Sai Sudharsan and Kusal Mendis are both playing really well! 50 partnership up between the two and they're going at 11 runs an over in the powerplay. Boundaries coming thick and fast. A bit of a desperate move from Hardik as he bowls in the powerplay, but it backfires as 14 come off the over.

GT 55/1 (5)

GT vs MI LIVE: Sudharsan crosses 700 runs!

BANG! Thrashed through the off-side by Sai Sudharsan! Gujarat Titans staying alive in this chase despite the early loss of their captain. Sudharsan crosses 700 runs in IPL 2025, what a year this has been for him.

GT 41/1 (4)

GT vs MI LIVE: FOUR!

Sai Sudharsan slams a boundary! Short ball by Gleeson and sharply pulled towards fine-leg by Sai Sudharsan. The left-hander needs to play a big innings today, as he nears the 700-run mark in IPL 2025.

GT 35/1 (3.3)

GT vs MI LIVE: 3 sixes in one over!

Maximums! First 6 of the Gujarat Titans innings. Three balls later, Kusal Mendis slams a maximum, cracking shot over deep mid-wicket. Having dropped Rohit earlier, he has a big responsibility on his shoulders with the bat today.

Make that THREE! Kusal again, over square-leg. Handsome shot.

GT 30/1 (3)

GT vs MI LIVE: Bumrah opens the bowling

Jasprit Bumrah taking the new ball from the other end. With no Deepak Chahar today, responsibility with the new ball returns to the shoulders of Bumrah. And he shows his quality. Does not offer an inch to the others.

GT 9/1 (2)

GT vs MI LIVE: OUT!

SHUBMAN GILL GONE! Humongous wicket for Mumbai Indians in the very first over. This is the worst-possible start for Gujarat Titans, they've lost their captain. Fast inswinger by Trent Boult, Gill misses it, traps on the pad and the finger goes up straight away.

Gill takes the DRS review, but he's out.

GT 5/1 (1)

GT vs MI LIVE: The chase begins...

Shubman Gill and B Sai Sudharsan are out to open, Trent Boult is taking the new ball. A daunting target is in front of Gujarat Titans. A cracking cover drive by Sai Sudharsan early on, but stopped well in the field.

GT 3/0 (0.3)

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: GT need 229

A massive target for Gujarat Titans. With no Jos Buttler, they will need Shubman Gill and B Sai Sudharsan to give them a terrific start, as well as hope that their slightly more fragile middle order can come good today. Onus on Kusal Mendis to make up for his fielding mistakes.

GT vs MI LIVE: MI end on 228

228! Daunting total set by Mumbai Indians in the Eliminator. It is the highest score made in the Mullanpur ground. Rohit Sharma leading the way with a sensational 81, and he's made sure that his Test captaincy successor Shubman Gill will not have an easy night to come.

MI 228/5 (20 overs)

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX MORE!

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! Hardik Pandya!

MONSTER HIT! Hardik Pandya sends it high, and handsome! Second ball of the over, Pandya is deep into his crease and sends it 95m into the stands. Mumbai Indians past 210. Misses out on the third ball.

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX! OUT!

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Injury concern for GT

Mohammed Siraj is down, and is being attended to by the physios. Two balls after taking a wicket, he seems to have picked up an injury. He is fit enough to continue, and he does get through the whole over. Still hobbling a fair bit, but a good comeback after conceding a six on the first ball.

MI 198/4 (18)

GT vs MI LIVE: OUT!

Six, but then out! Tilak Varma hammers Mohammed Siraj for a maximum on the first ball of the 17th over, but misses his timing on the pace-off delivery and departs. Handy 25 off just 11 balls by Tilak. MI are 6 short of 200.

MI 194/4 (17.2)

GT vs MI LIVE: OUT!

GONE! At last, at long last, Gujarat Titans have Rohit Sharma's wicket. Huge scalp for GT. Massive wicket. Goes for the slog over mid-wicket, but doesn't connect well, and a good catch taken by Rashid Khan in the deep. Rohit out for 81 off 50!

MI 188/3 (17)

GT vs MI LIVE: Tilak smashing it!

Prasidh Krishna back into the attack, and taken to the cleaners straight away by Tilak! Shuffles across the stumps and whacks it over square-leg for a maximum! Prasidh gave away 26 in his previous over, and this one hasn't started well.

MI 181/2 (16.1)

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Tilak into the party!

MI 175/2 (16)

GT vs MI LIVE: Rohit into the 80s

SIX more! Whipped away over square-leg, all the way for 6. Next ball, change of pace by Coetzee, goes for a cutter, soft edge from Rohit but it falls just short of Kusal Mendis. How many more chances will GT miss to dismiss Rohit?

MI 168/2 (15.4)

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX!

Maximum for Rohit Sharma! Up to 74! Rohit Sharma is just 26 runs away from this third IPL century, and first in the playoffs. Mumbai Indians are going at well over 10 runs an over, and should be aiming for at least 220 from here.

MI 160/2 (15)

GT vs MI LIVE: 150 up for Mumbai Indians!

Seven runs came off the over fromÂ Washington Sundar. Rohit Sharma played a cut shot on the fourth ball of the over through the backward point for a four. He is now batting at the score of 66 off 41 balls. 150 is up for Mumbai Indians.

MI 150/2 (14)

GT vs MI LIVE: OUT!

Big wicket this is! Suryakumar Yadav is OUT! It was a lower full toss from Sai Kishore outside off stump and Suryakumar played a sweep shot on it. He played it to perfection but found the man in the deep at backward square leg. Surya is gone for 33 off 20 balls.

MI 143/2 (13)

GT vs MI LIVE: Catch dropped!

It was an eventful over fromÂ Gerald Coetzee. He was hit for two consecutive sixes by Suryakumar Yadav but bounced back well and managed to produce an outside edge of the batter. GT wicketkeeperÂ Kusal Mendis jumped to his right and dropped the chance. A total of 14 runs came off the over.

MI 120/1 (11)

GT vs MI LIVE: 50 FOR ROHIT!

50 for Rohit Sharma! Big day, big player. Dropped twice at the start, and he's taken full advantage of the lifelines handed to him. Gets to the milestone in just 28 balls. However, a warning from Sunil Gavaskar, as he hits another difficult aerial shot. "Living dangerously," says Gavaskar.

MI 113/1 (10)

GT vs MI LIVE: SIX, 100 up!

Rohit Sharma goes big! 100 up for Mumbai Indians! Rohit is up to 46, MI reach 100 in under 9 overs. He has been dropped twice today, and he has made sure that Gujarat Titans pay the price for it.Â

Rohit into the party! Best powerplay of the season for MI, and we still have 3 balls to go. Swept over deep square-leg for a maximum, as R Sai Kishore comes into bowl his first over. Next ball, swept again, one bounce 4!

MI 75/0 (5.4)

GT vs MI LIVE: Bairstow going berserk!

6, 4, 6, 6, 4 - What an over for Mumbai Indians! Jonny Bairstow has hammered Prasidh Krishna for 26 runs in one over! Brutal hitting. Ryan Rickelton not there? No problem, says Jonny Bairstow. Off-side, on-side, down the ground, edge, everything going MI's way.

Shubman Gill does not look happy at all.

MI 54/0 (4)

Bairstow, MAXIMUM! What a hit from the Englishman, welcome back to the IPL! Length ball and Bairstow clears it over deep square-leg. Next ball, smashed through point for another boundary. Bairstow in the mood.

MI 38/0 (3.2)

GT vs MI LIVE: Rohit dropped again!

Another drop! Rohit Sharma has been dropped not once, but TWICE! Thick outside edge against Siraj, but wicket-keeper Kusal Mendis has completely fumbled it. Not easy filling the boots of Jos Buttler, but this could be a costly problem.Â

Rohit Sharma slams it down the ground! Classy shot from the former MI captain, straight back past the bowler. Next ball, he connects even better, one bounce and into the fence. Rohit was dropped on 3, will he make GT pay?

Big mistake! Rohit Sharma has been dropped by Gerald Coetzee! The veteran mistimed the shot completely, Coetzee was well-placed at long-on, but the ball just pops out of his hand. Massive fielding error by GT.

GT vs MI LIVE: New ball for Prasidh

Interesting decision by Shubman Gill! Prasidh Krishna is usually the middle overs enforcer and bowls at the death. But in the absence of Arshad Khan or Ishant Sharma, Prasidh is taking the new ball today for GT.

MI 15/0 (1.4)

GT vs MI LIVE: Good first over

Good first over by Mohammed Siraj. Just 6 runs come off it. Rohit Sharma and Jonny Bairstow with a couple of nice strokes through the off-side but denied by good fielding in the covers by GT. MI need to get a good powerplay, with Hardik taking the brave call of batting first.

MI 6/0 (1)

GT vs MI LIVE: Here come the players!

The players are out in the middle. Led by Shubman Gill, they walk past the fireworks go off. Jonny Bairstow is out to open for MI, coming in as the direct replacement of Ryan Rickelton. Rohit Sharma is opening at the other end.

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: 10 minutes to start!

We are just 10 minutes away from the start of Eliminator 1. A bunch of debutants on both sides, adding more international flavour to this contest. Gujarat Titans to bowl, because Mumbai Indians won the toss and opted to bat!Â 

GT vs MI LIVE: Can Rohit Sharma perform?

All eyes on Rohit Sharma. The veteran has had a stop-start season, but there is no better stage to bring out his A-game than tonight. Rohit has shown glimpses of his class this season, but can he save his best for the business end of the tournament?

GT vs MI LIVE: GT Playing XI

Gujarat Titans XI vs MI:Â Sai Sudharsan, Shubman Gill, Kusal Mendis (wk), Washington Sundar, Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, R Sai Kishore, Gerald Coetzee, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna.

Mendis replaces Buttler, who has gone for international duty. No Arshad Khan either as Washington comes in.

GT vs MI LIVE: MI Playing XI

Mumbai Indians playing XI vs GT:Â Rohit Sharma, Jonny Bairstow (wk), Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya (c), Naman Dhir, Raj Bawa, Mitchell Santner, Trent Boult, Jasprit Bumrah, Richard Gleeson.

3 debutants for MI -- Bairstow, Gleeson and Raj Bawa. Ashwani Kumar will likely be the Impact Player.

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: Surprise debutant for MI!

Mumbai Indians have been forced to make two changes to their lineup, with Will Jacks and Ryan Rickelton going away for international duty. Jonny Bairstow and Richard Gleeson enter. However, an interesting call - debut handed to Indian uncapped all-rounder Raj Bawa.

GT vs MI LIVE: MI WIN TOSS IN ELIMINATOR

Mumbai Indians have won the toss and opted to bat! Hardik Pandya calls it correctly, and has, perhaps a tad surprisingly, chosen to bat first in the Eliminator! Interesting call from the Mumbai Indians captain. GT to bowl, then.

GT vs MI LIVE: "MI will win," says AB

GT vs MI LIVE: Suryakumar eyeing huge record

Suryakumar Yadav is eyeing a massive record set by AB de Villiers. Having been MI's most consistent batter this year, SKY has already smashed 640 runs in IPL 2025. However, if he scores 48 more runs, he can cross de Villiers to become the middle-order batter with the most runs in a single season in IPL history.

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: GT vs MI H2H

What is the head-to-head record between Gujarat Titans and Mumbai Indians? GT hold an big 5-2 advantage over MI in their 7 meetings till date. The two teams have met twice this season already, with GT winning both home and away.

Can MI reverse that fate today?

GT vs MI LIVE, Eliminator: Toss in 20 minutes!

We are just 20 minutes away from toss time in Mullanpur, where the Eliminator is being held. GT are set to be led by India's new Test captain Shubman Gill. On the other hand, MI will be captained by Hardik Pandya, who will lead against his former franchise.

IPL 2025 Eliminator LIVE: GT eyeing second title

Gujarat Titans are a franchise that's only 4 years old. But already, they have two IPL finals and one IPL title to their name. Can they go the distance once again? Just like MI, they also need to win three matches in a row to make it happen.

GT vs MI LIVE: MI eyeing title no. 6

Mumbai Indians are eyeing a record sixth title. For captain Rohit Sharma, he's eyeing his 7th IPL trophy, something that no IPL player in history has done. But for that to happen, they will need to win 3 games in a row. Defeat today, and that dream will end in 2025.

GT vs MI LIVE: Qualifier 2 the target

The winner of today's match will qualify for Qualifier 2, where they will play Punjab Kings for a place in the final. The loser today will be eliminated from the tournament. Just to recap, Royal Challengers Bengaluru are already in the final, after they beat PBKS in Qualifier 1 yesterday!

GT vs MI LIVE: Hello and welcome!

A very good evening to one and all, welcome to NDTV Sports! IPL 2025 playoffs is in full swing, and today is the crucial Eliminator. Mumbai Indians take on Gujarat Titans, and it is a must-win match to keep the title hopes alive.
